name: Find Noir (Game Jam Build)
description:
Welcome to Find Noir, a short film noir themed game. You play as a detective who is trying to find lost jewelry. On your way you will have to solve several different puzzles. This game also features two secret endings.

This game was designed for a game jam at my college and was therefore made in under 48 hours. However, I have decided to expand upon it.

Credit to coolguy2443 and Timbre on Freesound.org for some sound clips they provided. The font used is called BrownBagLunch.
